clinical_study.brief_title: Study of the Colonic Carriage of Staphylococcus Aureus in a Prospective Cohort of Patients Undergoing Endoscopic Screening for Digestive Cancer in the University Hospital of Saint-Etienne
clinical_study.official_title: Study of the Colonic Carriage of Staphylococcus Aureus in a Prospective Cohort of Patients Undergoing Endoscopic Screening for Digestive Cancer in the University Hospital of Saint-Etienne.

lead_sponsor.agency: Centre Hospitalier Universitaire de Saint Etienne

clinical_study.source: Centre Hospitalier Universitaire de Saint Etienne

brief_summary.textblock: Epidemiological study aiming to describe the carriage (nasal, throat, groin, rectal and colonic) of S. aureus in patients without chronic digestive disease who are going to have a colonoscopy for cancer screening. The carriage will be analyzed globally and the similarity of strains isolated from each site will be analyzed using molecular tools. The aim of this study is to better estimate the digestive reservoir of S. aureus to better prevent endogenous infections due to this bacterium.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patient with Staphylococcus aureus colonic carriage
primary_outcome.description: Staphylococcus aureus carriage in the colon is measured by biopsy

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient with similar Staphylococcus aureus strains in the nose and in the rectum
secondary_outcome.description: Staphylococcus aureus carriage in the rectum and in the nose is measured by swab culture

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient with Staphylococcus aureus carriage in the nose
secondary_outcome.description: Staphylococcus aureus carriage in the nose is measured by swab culture.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient with Staphylococcus aureus carriage in the throat
secondary_outcome.description: Staphylococcus aureus carriage in the throat is measured by swab culture.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patient with Staphylococcus aureus carriage in the groin
secondary_outcome.description: Staphylococcus aureus carriage in the groin is measured by swab culture.

arm_group.description: Staphylococcus aureus carriage is measured in nose, throat, colon, rectum and groin

intervention.description: nasal, throat, rectal and groin sampling with swabs. Colonic sampling by colonic biopsy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient affiliated to French social security
- Written consent of the patient
- Patient needing a colonoscopy in the University Hospital of Saint-Etienne, France
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient who decline to participate to the study
- Patient in the incapacity to give consent
- Patient receiving treatment with anticoagulant or antiaggregant platelets
- Patients with a known haemostatic disorder
- Pregnant woman
- Patients with a chronic disease of the gastrointestinal tract
- Patients receiving long-term corticosteroid
- Patient receiving anti staphylococcal antibiotics
